com.paypal.test.utilities.logging

Interface SimpleLoggerEvents

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SeLionLogger.SeLionLoggerEventsImpl

    public interface SimpleLoggerEvents
    Hooks into SimpleLogger which can be implemented in your logger class

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onLog(LogRecord record)
      Called when events are logged by SimpleLogger.
      void onPostInitialization(SimpleLogger logger)
      Called after all log Handlers are initialized in SimpleLogger
      void onPreInitialization(SimpleLogger logger)
      Called before all log Handlers are initialized in SimpleLogger

    • Method Detail

      • onPreInitialization

        void onPreInitialization(SimpleLogger logger)
        Called before all log Handlers are initialized in SimpleLogger
        Parameters:
        logger - - the Logger at the point of triggering this hook

      • onPostInitialization

        void onPostInitialization(SimpleLogger logger)
        Called after all log Handlers are initialized in SimpleLogger
        Parameters:
        logger - - the Logger at the point of triggering this hook

      • onLog

        void onLog(LogRecord record)
        Called when events are logged by SimpleLogger. This method exists as a means of convenience.
        Parameters:
        record - - the LogRecord associated with the event
